channel.title: Big problem
channel.description:
when ever i talk to a Shop i disconnect... this is what the run server says:
[code] Satan's Isle : Second Pk source , is ONLINE ! ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:2992 warlord2 is signing onto server. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -108 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16133) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15179) at client.process(client.java:15151) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Haxxor's Isle[fatal] - exception Game saved for player warlord2 ClientHandler: Client warlord2 disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:2995 warlord2 is signing onto server. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -108 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16133) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15179) at client.process(client.java:15151) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Haxxor's Isle[fatal] - exception Game saved for player warlord2 ClientHandler: Client warlord2 disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:2998 warlord2 is signing onto server. Game saved for player warlord2 ClientHandler: Client warlord2 disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:3001 warlord is signing onto server. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -108 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16133) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15179) at client.process(client.java:15151) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Haxxor's Isle[fatal] - exception Game saved for player warlord ClientHandler: Client warlord disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:3004 warlord is signing onto server. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -108 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16133) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15179) at client.process(client.java:15151) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:50) Haxxor's Isle[fatal] - exception Game saved for player warlord ClientHandler: Client warlord disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:3007 warlord is signing onto server. [/code]
Can any 1 help me? :(

item.title: Big problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Yeah, use tabs, I done this too a while ago. :o

Read full topic

item.title: Big problem
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

L2Shop …

Use TAB button to make spaces between each number …
NOT SPACEBAR!

Read full topic
